stack.title: Stack
stack.intro: As a senior frontend developer, my goal is to create attractive, efficient, and accessible user experiences. Throughout my career, I have honed my skills using a variety of tools and technologies that allow me to develop robust and high-performance interfaces.

workExperience.intro: Software enginer with over 8 years of experience, specialized in front-end development using technologies such as React and React Native. Throughout my career, I have developed numerous web and mobile applications, ensuring a smooth and attractive user experience. I am always eager to learn new technologies, which allows me to bring innovative solutions to the projects I work on.
